ValidationRule.description: Alerts users that when data is missing in fields that are used to populate info into the welcome email.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Retailer_Type__c, "SI"), ISPICKVAL(Retailer_Type__c, "Combo")), RecordType.Name = "Viasat", ISBLANK(Welcome_Email_Sent__c), ISPICKVAL(Application_Status__c, "Setup Complete"), OR( ISBLANK(SI_Number__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please ensure the SI Number field is filled in before saving the record.
